model

Class RuleSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.RuleSet

  • public class RuleSet
extends Object
    This class represents a table of truth. This can be the intensional clauses of the database or any table of truth from which it is needed to create a proof.

    The rules are stored as Rule in an ArrayList.

    Author:
    Alexandre Camus

    • Method Detail

      • getRuleStandardizedApart

        public Rule getRuleStandardizedApart(int index)
        Gets the standardized version of the rule number index. This uses the method standardizeVariablesApart() on the rule at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - the position of the rule in the set.
        Returns:
        a Rule object representing the standardized rule which was at the specified position.

        public Rule getRule(int index)
        Gets the rule at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        index - the position of the rule
        Returns:
        the Rule object representing the specified rule.

      • getRules

        public ArrayList<Rule> getRules()
        Gets all the rules of the set.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList object containing the rules of the set.

      • getRuleCount

        public int getRuleCount()
        Gets the size of the set. The size of the set is simply the number of rules in the set.
        Returns:
        the number of rules in the set.

      • removeRule

        public void removeRule(Rule rule)
        Removes the specified rule from the set.
        Parameters:
        rule - the exact Rule object to remove.

      • removeRule

        public void removeRule(int index)
        Removes the rule at the specified position from the set.
        Parameters:
        index - the position of the rule to remove.

      • addRules

        public void addRules(ArrayList<Rule> rules)
        Adds all the rules that are in the specified ArrayList.
        Parameters:
